name: Giant Honey Bee
description: The Giant Honey Bee is a small and mobile creature capable of flight, with notable dexterity that allows it to evade attacks. Its strong sting delivers piercing damage along with a potent poison effect.
memorable: Its sting not only inflicts damage but can also paralyze characters with poison, making it a formidable opponent despite its low health.
goals: To defend its territory and propagate its species.
relations: Often found in proximity to flowers and other pollinators.
environment: Typically found in grassy fields, gardens, or areas with abundant flowering plants.
strengths: Quick and agile, capable of flying to avoid danger while delivering a paralyzing sting.
weaknesses: Low hit points make it susceptible to attacks despite its speed.
attacks: Sting attack that deals piercing damage combined with a powerful poison effect that can paralyze targets.
most_powerful_ability: The poison from its sting can leave targets paralyzed for an hour if they fail their saving throw.
senses: Blindsight out to 30 feet allows it to detect nearby creatures without needing sight.
skills: Proficient in survival checks, reflecting its ability to navigate its environment effectively.
additional_information: Can incapacitate characters with its poison effect.
Fast flying speed allows for evasive maneuvers.
Relatively low challenge rating makes it an uncommon adversary.
Its sting can stabilize targets at 0 hit points but still leave them poisoned.
Plays a role in the ecosystem as a pollinator.
